resources.string:
1. Hold down the 'Detect' button until green LED lights up. 

 2. Locate device's magnetometer by moving a coin or other magnetic metal object around back of device until the red LEDs light up in sequence. Then mark this location with the magnetometer icon. 

 3. Move device along wall while holding 'Detect' button until red LEDs light up in sequence. 

 4. Beeper and red LEDs lighting up in sequence indicate a stud directly under your device's magnetometer. 

 5. Adjust sensitivity level for best results: 
 -DECREASE sensitivity if green LED doesn't stay illuminated while moving device along wall (e.g. thin drywall) 
 -INCREASE sensitivity until all red LEDs light up when atop a screw (e.g. thick drywall).
